appDetails.developerName: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor

title: Remote Control for All TV

container.value: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor

creator: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor
descriptionHtml:
Remote Control For All TV is the smart app to control all the functionality of your smart TV. Using the TV remote control app, you can access your TV via wifi connection. This app provides all the functionalities that your physical remote provides and other advanced functions as well. This is the best remote control app that supports almost all the TV brands and models that exist around the world.

The TV remote control app not only supports TV remotes but also provides remotes for other electronic devices that you use in your routine life. You can also access all the set-top boxes, DVD player, and air-conditioners. Afterwards, we have improved the app to support more electronic devices. You can control your camera, projector, A/V receiver, wifi devices and fan as well using this universal remote control app.

# New Features Added in Remote Control for All TV :

1. Screen mirroring
- You can cast your mobile phone's screen on your TV. Whatever you do on your mobile phone, the same screen will be cast on your TV screen.

2. Screencast / Chrome cast
- Chromecast provides easy access to multiple streaming services on your TV screen such as photos, videos, audio, YouTube and IPTV as well.

appDetails.developerName: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor

title: Remote Control for All TV

creator: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor
descriptionHtml:
Turn the phone into an all-in-one smart Remote control for all TV & Set up boxes.

Do you hate losing your remote control? The Remote Control for All TV app will let you control all of your TVs from one place. Whether you have a smart TV or a regular TV, Remote Control for All TV will work for you. Download Remote Control for All TV & have all your TV at your fingertips. Remote control for all tv is a universal remote app for Tv that works with all brands of televisions. Remote Controller will eliminate the need to search for your TV remote & allows you to easily change the channel, volume, & other settings on your TV. You can search with voice search. Just command your remote will work for you. The app is multi-language supported with languages like Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, English, & Urdu as per your convenience.

Features of Remote For all TV
Smart TV Remote Control For all tv
Do you want to control your smart TV with your smartphone? Universal Remote app offers an Android TV Remote for TV that supports more than 130 brands of TV. This smart remote tv control app is easy to use & can be operated by anyone. With this Android remote control for tv, you can easily connect your TV & mobile device to the same Wi-Fi network & then enable ADB Debugging.

Cast for Chromecast & TV Cast
Chromecast is a device that allows you to cast. The app has a lot of features that make it interesting, such as the ability to cast photos, videos, & audio. It can also cast YouTube videos & IPTV channels. The app also lets you change your service provider, easily mark your favourite channels & shows, as well as schedule alerts for later viewing.

Screen Mirroring with All TV
Screen Mirroring allows you to mirror the screen of your smartphone on your television. Whatever you do on your phone, the same screen will be displayed on your TV. This innovative product provides an easy & convenient way to view your phone's screen on a larger screen. Screen Mirroring is perfect for watching movies, playing games, or browsing the internet on a larger screen. You can mirror the screen of your smartphone on your television. Whatever you do on your phone, the same screen will be displayed on your TV.

TV Remote Control For All - IR TV
Upgrade your TV viewing experience, IR TV Remotes provides a universal remote control app for a wide range of TVs & Set-Top Boxes. We also have remotes for Air Conditioners, Cameras, Projectors, & A/V Receivers. We have more than 10000 products from 90+ brands. This app is easy to use & provides a wide range of functionality. All the worldwide brands are included.

On Air
Watch your favourite shows on the go with our On-Air section. You can cast all the shows directly on your smart TV, set reminders & make the show a favourite. Plus, you can select the language in which you want to watch the show: English, Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, etc. Shows are also arranged generation-wise, like sports, news, movies, & music.

Channels & Movies
With this section, you can favourite & unfavorite channels & set reminders for the particular channels' particular shows with just one tap, so you will never miss out on your favourite show. The "movie" tab contains films in all languages & is organised chronologically. With the toggle button, the user can shift from HD to non-HD movies.

Change cable
You can change the cable settings at any time with your phone. Airtel, DD Free Dish, Dish TV DTH, Sun Direct DTH, & all the worldwide cable brands.

This remote control universal app supports not only all TV brands & modules, but also other electronic devices such as set-top boxes, AC, cameras, projectors, fans, WiFi devices, DVD players, & A/V Receivers. Universal remote control for tv controller will control all your electronic gadgets, but your device must be IR sensor supported.

appDetails.developerName: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor

title: Remote Control for All TV

creator: Background Changer, Eraser & Booth Photo Editor
descriptionHtml:
Turn the phone into an all-in-one smart Remote control for all TV & Set up boxes.

Do you hate losing your Smart Remote for Tv? The Remote Control for All TV app will let you control all of your TVs from one place. Whether you have a smart TV or a regular TV, Remote Control for All TV will work for you. Download Remote Control for TV & have all your TV at your fingertips. Remote control for android tv is a universal remote app for Tv that works with all brands of televisions. Remote Controller will eliminate the need to search for your universal TV remote & allows you to easily change the channel, volume, & other settings on your TV. You can search with voice search. Just command your remote will work for you. The universal tv remote control app is multi-language supported with languages like Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, English, & Urdu as per your convenience.

Features of Remote For all TV
Smart TV Remote Control For all tv
Do you want to control your smart TV with your smartphone? Universal Remote app offers an Android TV Remote for TV that supports more than 130 brands of TV. This smart ac remote tv control app is easy to use & can be operated by anyone. With this Android remote for tv, you can easily connect your TV & mobile device to the same Wi-Fi network & then enable ADB Debugging.

Cast for Chromecast & TV Cast
Chromecast is a device that allows you to cast. The best universal remote app has many features that make it interesting, such as the ability to cast photos, videos, & audio. It can also cast YouTube videos & IPTV channels.

Screen Mirroring with All TV
Screen Mirroring allows you to mirror the screen of your smartphone on your television. Whatever you do on your phone, the same screen will be displayed on your TV. This innovative product provides an easy & convenient way to view your phone's screen on a larger screen. Screen Mirroring is perfect for watching movies, playing games, or browsing the internet on a larger screen. You can mirror the screen of your smartphone on your television. Whatever you do on your phone, the same screen will be displayed on your TV.

TV Remote Control For All - IR TV
Upgrade your TV viewing experience, IR TV Remotes provides a universal remote control app for a wide range of TVs & Set-Top Boxes. We also have smart universal remotes for Air Conditioners, Cameras, Projectors, & A/V Receivers. We have more than 10000 products from 90+ brands. This smart remote app is easy to use & provides a wide range of functionality. All the worldwide brands are included.

On Air
Watch your favourite shows on the go with our On-Air section & Control Smart TV. You can cast all the shows directly on your smart TV, set reminders & make the show a favourite. Plus, you can select the language in which you want to watch the show: English, Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, etc. Shows are also arranged generation-wise, like sports, news, movies, & music.

Channels & Movies
With this section, you can favourite & unfavorite channels & set reminders for the particular channels' particular shows with just one tap, so you will never miss out on your favourite show. The "movie" tab contains films in all languages & is organised chronologically. With the toggle button, the user can shift from HD to non-HD movies.

Change cable
You can change the cable settings at any time with your phone. Airtel, DD Free Dish, Dish TV DTH, Sun Direct DTH, & all the worldwide cable brands.

This remote control universal app supports not only all TV brands & modules, but also other electronic devices such as set-top boxes, AC, cameras, projectors, fans, WiFi devices, DVD players, & A/V Receivers. Universal remote control for tv controller will control all your electronic gadgets, but your device must be IR sensor supported.
descriptionShort: All-in-One Remote Control app For TV, Set-top box, AC & All Smart IR Device
